issue.title: [Packaging] Set crossbow target explicitly to enable building arbitrary arrow repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4229](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4229). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like:
```java

python crossbow.py submit -r kszucs/arrow -v 0.12.0 conda-linux-py27

python crossbow.py submit -r apache/arrow -t apache-arrow-0.12.0 -v 0.12.0 -g wheel
```
